mapper.select: select top 1 * from POST where code < CAST(#{code} as INT) order by regdate desc
select top 1 * from POST where code > CAST(#{code} as INT) order by regdate asc
mapper.update: update POST set hit = hit + 1 where code = #{code}

SELECT TB2.PHOTO FROM POST TB1 JOIN PHOTOFILE TB2 ON TB1.CODE = TB2.POST_CODE WHERE TB1.EMAIL = #{email} ORDER BY TB2.REGDATE DESC
